requirement_description: Full-text search across all terms, definitions, and labels

requirement_description: Stable, dereferenceable URI for each term
SKOS term relationships (broader, narrower, related, synonyms)

requirement_description: SPARQL endpoint for programmatic vocabulary queries
REST API for external system integration
comments: SKOSMOS REST at :9090/rest/v1/; verified via test-rest-api.sh

requirement_description: Import and export in CSV and RDF/Turtle formats
comments: csv-to-skos.py + skos-to-csv.py + load-data.sh + export-data.sh; no web UI

requirement_description: Role-based access control for term creation, editing, and approval
comments: Nginx gateway with 3-tier RBAC (anonymous/editor/admin); verified via test-rbac.sh

requirement_description: Version history and audit trail for all term changes
comments: snapshot.sh + audit-log.py; manifest-based versioning with JSON change logs

requirement_description: Multilingual labels and definitions per term
comments: en/es/fr labels on key terms; SKOSMOS language dropdown; verified via test-multilingual.sh

requirement_description: Web-based browsing interface for vocabulary hierarchy
comments: SKOSMOS UI at :9090 with top concept navigation

requirement_description: Bulk term loading from structured data sources

TDB2 persistent storage designed for scale

validate-skos.py passes; CI/CD validates on every push
